prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a mischievous grin and shadowy form.
I want a spooky Pokemon that thrives in dark caves and scares its foes.
Generate a playful ghost with a purple body and haunting yellow eyes.
Make a ghostly creature that can phase through walls and appears in urban areas.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses illusions to trick opponents, featuring a unique color palette.
Design a Pokemon with a round body and long tongue that loves to haunt forests.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both ghostly and poison traits, with a chilling presence.
